uqa.ner module¶

Named entity recognition with SpaCy french model.

uqa.ner.ner(fcontent: Union[Dict, List], model: spacy.language.Language) → Union[Dict, List][source]¶

Use model to perform NER on the ‘default’ structure data container fcontent.

Parameters

  • fcontent (TJson) – A json-like data object with default structure.

  • model (spacy.language.Language) – A loaded SpaCy model with ‘ner’ pipe in the pipeline

Returns

TJson – The processed data

uqa.ner.ner_dl(data_it: Iterable[Tuple[str, Union[Dict, List]]], model_name='fr_core_news_md') → Iterable[Tuple[str, Union[Dict, List]]][source]¶

Load spacy model_name perform NER on the ‘default’ structure dataset iterable data_it.

Parameters

  • data_it (DataIterble) – A dateset iterable in default format.

  • model_name (str, default="fr_core_news_md") – The name of the spacy model to load, the model has to be locally installed prior to be used.

Returns

DataIterble – The processed dateset iterable.
